name: QLBase
author: nathannestein
description: Decentralizable, scalable, and reliable backend solution alternative to traditional NoSQL, SaaS, and cloud-based services.

windows:build-backend: cd backend/auth && go build -ldflags=-w -ldflags=-s -o auth && mv ./auth ../../bin/auth && cd ../..
cd backend/data_analytics && go build -ldflags=-w -ldflags=-s -o data_analytics && mv ./data_analytics ../../bin/data_analytics && cd ../..
cd backend/database && go build -ldflags=-w -ldflags=-s -o database && mv ./database ../../bin/database && cd ../..
cd backend/forgetpass && go build -ldflags=-w -ldflags=-s -o forgetpass && mv ./forgetpass ../../bin/forgetpass && cd ../..
cd backend/logger && go build -ldflags=-w -ldflags=-s -o logger && mv ./logger ../../bin/logger && cd ../..
cd backend/storage && go build -ldflags=-w -ldflags=-s -o storage && mv ./storage ../../bin/storage && cd ../..
cd backend/sms && go build -ldflags=-w -ldflags=-s -o sms && mv ./sms ../../bin/sms && cd ../..
cd backend/traffic && go build -ldflags=-w -ldflags=-s -o traffic && mv ./traffic ../../bin/traffic && cd ../..
zip-up: zip -q -r qlbase.zip api assets bin components controller docs drive scripts side styles views favicon.ico .htaccess 404.html index.php sandbox.php
